AIRX.OL.summary: Airthings AS develops and manufactures radon and indoor air quality monitors. The company offers its products under the Wave, Wave Plus, Wave Mini, Hub, Plus, and Pro brands. It serves homeowners and businesses. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

KIT.OL.summary: Kitron ASA, an electronics manufacturing services company, together with its subsidiaries, develops, industrializes, and manufactures electronics for the energy/telecoms, defense/aerospace, offshore/marine, medical device, and industry sectors. It manufactures electronics that are embedded in the customers' products; and box-built electronic products. The company's services include development services, such as product development, product management, re-engineering, and value analysis/value engineering; and industrialization services, including prototype manufacturing, evaluation of new products, component engineering and database, test development, design and build of high level assembly lines, and environmental durability testing. Its services also comprise sourcing and logistics services; manufacturing, assembling, and testing of electronic products for the professional market; and maintenance, repair, and refurbishment programs. The company provides its products and services in Norway, Sweden, Lithuania, Germany, Poland, China, the United States, and internationally. Kitron ASA is headquartered in Billingstad, Norway.
